title: Tuning the heterostructure of Zn–Fe–O nanoparticles for highly efficient photocatalytic removal of U(VI) under different light intensities
content:

DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00163J, Paper
Yunxuan Wu, Weixia Zhou, Zhimin Dong, Yongchuan Wu, Jiayu Liu, Jian Huang, Zhijian Zheng, Zhibin Zhang, Lin Xu, Xiaohong Cao, Yunhai Liu
